      • getResponse

        public final <I extends XmlObjectModelling> I getResponse​(java.lang.Class<I> responseClass,
                                                          XmlObjectModelling request)
                                                   throws ConnectionLtException
        Description copied from interface: ConnectionClientItf
        Sends request to server and waits for response casted to responseClass.

        Remember that you can release the request and response as soon as became garbage.
        Specified by:
        getResponse in interface ConnectionClientItf
        Parameters:
        responseClass - expected class from server
        request - to send to server
        Returns:
        response from server
        Throws:
        ConnectionLtException - if an exception was raised and is related with the connection, that exception should be put in the cause of the ConnectionLtException
